item.description: HI MY NAME IS JO-ANN AND I AM AN ASSISTANT ORGANIZER FOR THE ENERGY HEALING GROUP. I HAVE SET UP A TIME AT THE PLAINVILLE LIBRARY AT 56 EAST MAIN ST, PLAINVILLE, CT. I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE FUN TO BRING OUR OWN CRYSTALS AND ANY OTHER BOOKS OR MEDIA THAT HAS HELPED US LEARN ABOUT CRYSTALS. I WOULD LIKE THE MEETING TO BE AN OPEN FORUM OF PEOPLE SHARING THEIR HEALING EXPERIENCES WITH CRYSTALS ALONG WITH OPEN DIALOG SO WE ALL CAN ASK QUESTIONS AND LEARN. I INVITE THE EXPERIENCED TO THE CURIOUS TO ATTEND. I WOULD ALSO LIKE TO BRAINSTORM ON OTHER IDEAS FOR OTHER MEETINGS IF WE HAVE TIME. IF NOT I AM WILLING TO RECEIVE EMAILS AND SET UP THE MEETINGS. I FEEL WE ALL HAVE SO MUCH TO OFFER EACH OTHER IN THE WAY THAT WE PRACTICE HEALING OTHERS. I AM OPEN TO ANY AND ALL IDEAS.
item.how_to_find_us: I WILL BE IN THE MEETING ROOM WHICH IS IN THE BASEMENT AREA OF THE LIBRARY. IT IS THE SMALLER MEETING ROOM.
item.name: LET'S TALK CRYSTALS
